title: First Snow Courtyard
description: A light, first snow covers the bright courtyard. The shiny door frames and windows of the building reflect the soft winter light. The leafless trees stand stark against the light coating of snow that blankets the slightly crimson black bricks and their white mortar lines just visible through the snow cover.
cone_prompt: An orange colored cone on the flat ground.
foreground_prompt: Barely visible under the first snowfall, slightly crimson black bricks with distinct mortar lines peep through.
